of the Egyptian special forces stands guard on the main floor of the Egyptian Museum.( Todras-Whitehill/AP) Zahi Hawass said that many protesters helped to defend the museum from looters. he told The Washington Post. They know this museum is their cultural heritage. This could have been the blackest day of my life, but thank God, we are protecting the sites. Egyptian protesters, some wielding billy clubs, formed a human chain at the museum's front gate to prevent looters from making off with any of its priceless artifacts. Reuters)- Cocoa exporters in Ivory Coast said they were conducting business as usual on Monday while awaiting clarity on a call for a ban on shipments by Alassane Ouattara , rival presidential claimant to incumbent Laurent Gbagbo. It is true that there is this political situation which is putting us in the spotlight but we are getting on with things as usual, said the director of an Abidjan-based export firm.`` We are continuing the( registering) and we hope that things will move on so we can work in peace and quiet,'' he added,

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
